item.title: React JS
item.description: React’s Origin Story React wasn’t born in a vacuum. It was Facebook’s answer to specific challenges: managing vast, dynamic user interfaces with data changing all the time. Before React, updating user interfaces efficiently was a major headache for developers. React’s solution? The virtual DOM, a game-changer that allowed for minimal actual DOM manipulation, leading to significant performance improvements. The Virtual DOM Explained The virtual DOM is a lightweight copy of the real DOM.
